Some of the background details of this story are based, very, very loosely, on real events of the era in which this was placed. The story combines elements from several programs that ran from 1960 - 1962: Goodyear Presents Ken Murray Show, Lehman's Odyssey and ABC (American Broadcasting Company) late night color spectaculars. Over 1 dozen sets were used for making this film.
